## tooltipTemplate variable

Creates a template for the [Tooltip](./fast-foundation.tooltip.md) component using the provided prefix.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tooltipTemplate: FoundationElementTemplate<ViewTemplate<Tooltip>>
```
